location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP shewing proposal for preliminary development of desert tract'

mods.abstract: The map shows Basrah, the Shatt el Arab and Euphrates river. It also shows irrigation and drainage channels. The map also indicates hydrology and settlements, with brief descriptions of topography, vegetation such as date gardens, and the residence of a notable sheikh. Water levels are indicated by detailed numbering.The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads 'S.D.O. No. 1374 September, 1915'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
